headline: Salesforce & other software names could make a comeback next year
summary: Software companies like Salesforce (CRM) and Intuit (INTU) could finally see gains from the artificial intelligence (AI) revolution in 2026, Robinhood chief investment officer Stephanie Guild tells Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi on Opening Bid. Watch the video above to hear more. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
